Body:
likelihood_gaussian_mc, likelihood_gaussian = _make_montecarlo_likelihoods(
    likelihood_var)
mean1, var1 = likelihood_gaussian_mc.predict_mean_and_var(mu, var)
mean2, var2 = likelihood_gaussian.predict_mean_and_var(mu, var)
assert_allclose(mean1, mean2, rtol=0.0005, atol=0.0001)
assert_allclose(var1, var2, rtol=0.0005, atol=0.0001)
pytest.mark.parametrize('likelihood_var', [0.3, 0.5, 1.0])pytest.mark.parametrize('mu, var, y', [_make_montecarlo_mu_var_y()])
